crud.jsonrpc: SELECT CARD_NO "cardno",USER_ID "userid",BAL_AT_REPORTING "balatreporting",SPENT_AFT_REPORT_TRANS "spentaftreporttrans",SPENT_AFT_REPORT_NONTRANS "spentaftreportnontrans",BAL_AT_BLOCKING "balatblocking",CARD_STATUS "cardstatus",CARD_INSURE_AVAIL "cardinsureavail",INS_POLICY_NO "inspolicyno",REFUND_MODE "refundmode",REPLACE_CARD_NO "replacecardno",REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE "refundexpirydate",REFUND_STATUS "refundstatus",BLOCKED_BY "blockedby",REPORTING_TIME "reportingtime",BLOCKING_TIME "blockingtime",BLOCK_REASON "blockreason",POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER "policereportnumber",POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE "policereportduedate",INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED "insamountclaimed",REFUND_CHANNEL "refundchannel",POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME "policereportfilename",TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT "totalmisusedamount",UNSYNC_SETTLED "unsyncsettled",SAW_FILE_REF_ID "sawfilerefid",SAW_RESULT "sawresult",INSUR_FILE_REF_ID "insurfilerefid",INSUR_RESULT "insurresult",MTR_FILE_REF_ID "mtrfilerefid",PREV_REFUND_STATUS "prevrefundstatus",PREV_REFUND_CHANNEL "prevrefundchannel",UPDATE_DATE "updatedate",UPDATED_BY "updatedby",REJECT_REASON "rejectreason",EMAIL_NOTIFIED "emailnotified",SAW_TXN_REF "sawtxnref",INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE "insurfilerecvdate",SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE "sawfilerecvdate",MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE "mtrfilerecvdate",REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP "replacecardnotmp" FROM CARD_BLOCK_REFUND select count('x') from CARD_BLOCK_REFUND

crud.sqlupdate: update CARD_BLOCK_REFUND set USER_ID = #inp.form1[0].userid, BAL_AT_REPORTING = #inp.form1[0].balatreporting, SPENT_AFT_REPORT_TRANS = #inp.form1[0].spentaftreporttrans, SPENT_AFT_REPORT_NONTRANS = #inp.form1[0].spentaftreportnontrans, BAL_AT_BLOCKING = #inp.form1[0].balatblocking, CARD_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].cardstatus, CARD_INSURE_AVAIL = #inp.form1[0].cardinsureavail, INS_POLICY_NO = #inp.form1[0].inspolicyno, REFUND_MODE = #inp.form1[0].refundmode, REPLACE_CARD_NO = #inp.form1[0].replacecardno, REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE = #inp.form1[0].refundexpirydate, REFUND_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].refundstatus, BLOCKED_BY = #inp.form1[0].blockedby, REPORTING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].reportingtime, BLOCKING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].blockingtime, BLOCK_REASON = #inp.form1[0].blockreason, POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER = #inp.form1[0].policereportnumber, POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE = #inp.form1[0].policereportduedate, INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED = #inp.form1[0].insamountclaimed, REFUND_CHANNEL = #inp.form1[0].refundchannel, POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME = #inp.form1[0].policereportfilename, TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT = #inp.form1[0].totalmisusedamount, UNSYNC_SETTLED = #inp.form1[0].unsyncsettled, SAW_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerefid, SAW_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].sawresult, INSUR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerefid, INSUR_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].insurresult, MTR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerefid, PREV_REFUND_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].prevrefundstatus, PREV_REFUND_CHANNEL = #inp.form1[0].prevrefundchannel, UPDATE_DATE = #inp.form1[0].updatedate, UPDATED_BY = #inp.form1[0].updatedby, REJECT_REASON = #inp.form1[0].rejectreason, EMAIL_NOTIFIED = #inp.form1[0].emailnotified, SAW_TXN_REF = #inp.form1[0].sawtxnref, INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerecvdate, SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerecvdate, MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerecvdate, REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP = #inp.form1[0].replacecardnotmp WHERE CARD_NO=#inp.form1[0].cardno
